rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 15 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 11:52 AM, 09 July 2025(Wednesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Nueva Ecija, Laguna, Cavite and Batangas within the next 2 hours.



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Metro Manila(Quezon City, Valenzuela, Malabon, Caloocan, Manila, Navotas, Marikina), Bulacan(Meycauayan, Marilao, Bocaue, Bulakan, Paombong, Malolos, Obando, Santa Maria, Hagonoy, Dona Remedios Trinidad, Norzagaray, San Jose del Monte), Rizal(Rodriguez, Antipolo, San Mateo), Pampanga(Masantol), Bataan(Orani, Samal, Abucay, Balanga, Pilar, Morong, Hermosa, Dinalupihan), Zambales(Olongapo, Subic, Castillejos, San Marcelino, Cabangan, Botolan), Tarlac(Mayantoc, San Jose, Capas) and Quezon(San Francisco, San Andres) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
